name: Growing Seeds
description:
Story:

The world is invaded by robots, almost no life is remaining on Earth. 

Your duty as the merciful god of that land is to regrow vegetation and recover the levels of oxygen needed for organic life to return.

 In order to do this, you'll cultivate new species of plants capable of withstanding the scary powerful robots and show them no mercy.

*Be careful, they're already patrolling this site* Controls:

Mouse - Move and cultivate plants.

Q & R - Switch between the available plants.

  Disclaimer:

This version is a post-jam one. The improvements made are:

- Added growing animation for plants

- Added "win state"

- Added SFX for plants and UI

- Fixed issue with plant colliders

- Added credits

Jam version: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/growing-seeds-9

Who made it possible?
